revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Pikachu Valley |image = [[File:Pikachu Valley.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Pikachu Valley. |tokens = 850,000 |location = North of Route 4 }} '''Pikachu Valley''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 5x5 in size, respectively; including 15 chest tiles, 36 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 11,952,804 HP. == Encounter Tables == ===Wild Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Pikachu.png|40px]] Pikachu ||rowspan=7 colspan=2|

59,764,020 || rowspan=7 colspan=3|
